const std::string &  msg,
bool  delimiter = true 
) [virtual]

A message to be processed by the stream.

Parameters:
level - What level of verbosity is associated with this message, higher number == more verbosity.
msg - Message that is to be processed.
delimiter - Should a delimiter be emitted as well?
